reference.title: WebSocket Information for Intelligent Cities APIs
reference.shortdesc: Using WebSocket with the Intelligent Cities services: Parking Planning, Traffic Planning, and Pedestrian Planning API services provides the ability to retrieve near-real-time data by assetUID, locations (bbox), or locationUID to obtain insight into the events collected by each service.

section.p: To retrieve near real-time events, use the WebSocket protocol instead of HTTPS for streaming data. The streaming endpoint format is: wss://<streaming url>
section.note: You need to send the bearer token andÂ Predix-Zone-Id while establishing the socket connection.

section.p: WebSocket URL: "wss://<production_url>/events"Predix Tool Kit offers a websocket client that you can use for websocket calls.
